start.text: What kind of big brother wouldn't be happy to have a sister like myself?
Big Bro~ Big Bro~ Give Momona a good chance to show off!
Combination of Stupid Brother and Cute Sister, heheh~

start_boss.text: I hear this ship has a lot of stories, can big brother tell it to Momona?

retreat.text: Big Bro!Momona will retreat and refit for now, be sure to comeback safely!

out_of_missiles.text: Stupid Brother only prepared this little bit of missiles for sis.
Sis wants to carry more missle, pretty please, big bro.
Big bro bought this missile with his money, so little sis won't hesitate in using them~

engaged.text: Stupid big bro really need Momona's help.
Brother and Sister's combination, can't miss a single one.
Heheh, don't forget to reward your little sis after this battle, big bro.

need_help.text: Hmph, stupid brother promised to protect his little sis.
Will big bro come save little sis like the princes in the stories?
Stupid brother! Your little sis is getting kidnapped by the bad guys!
Maybe big bro will pay attention to little sis if I cry a little.

pursuing.text: Stupid brother, that's not how you fly a ship!
Big brother, come and use the special combination attack with little sis.
Brother and Sister as one heart, none shall stand in our way!

running.text: Momona is going to hide behind big brother.
The best hiding spot is behind brother's mountain like body.

hull_90.text: A big bro won't make his little sis drive a junk ship, right~
The ship got scratched!Even if big bro doesn't mind, I do.

hull_50.text: Big bro!Little sis need you to show me how its done in person!

hull_30.text: Could big bro really be an idiot, I'm like this and he still isn't coming......
Could big bro be angry at me, and thats why he isn't coming to help?! Impossible!

overload.text: Wouldn't it be great if the overload can be passed onto big bro's ship?
Big bro~can you teach little sis how to quickly get rid of overload~
The control station is all biribiri right now.

death.text: Big bro better comfort me properly tonight.
Big bro! That's the one that was bullying your sister, hurry and help me get back at it!

victory.text: I Won! As reward Momona can hug big bro as she goes to sleep tonight~
Big bro is so lucky to have the world's cutest, smartest little sister!
Heh, watch me hug big bro from behind. Aiya~It's a hologram!
So tired, since big bro is busy, I'll sleep on big bro's bed for now~
Hmm, stupid brother has uppgraded to not so stupid but still stupid big brother in my heart.
